context: The word 'tegid' is the plural form of the Estonian verb 'panema', which means 'to place' or 'to put'. This versatile verb has multiple meanings including physically placing objects somewhere, assigning tasks, causing someone to do something, determining value or position, and various other figurative uses. In its third-person plural form (tegid), it would be used when referring to what 'they' are putting or placing.
